transArray.content: The room was very clean, the service attitude was great, and a drink was given as a souvenir. The location is very close to Haidian Wuluju Subway Station. You can find it within a short walk of the subway. However, the TV was a bit flawed, but it did not affect the experience. living experience.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your trust in the hotel room, the guest room lady and the front desk boy. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. We delivered The quality of our products and services is reliable, and cleanliness and safety come first. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your visit. Check in next time, thank you! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
